overview:
Shree laxmi Narasimmar Electronics

Incepted in the year 1996, Shree laxmi Narasimmar Electronics is one of the leading manufacturers and suppliers of a comprehensive range of Security Systems And Other Associated Electrical Products. These include Electronic Security System, Wireless Security System, Micro Controller Security System, Alarm System, Heat Detector, Automatic Heat Detector And Wireless Heat Detector. Apart from these, we are also offering Fire Alarm Panel, Water Level Controller, Digital LCD Water Level Indicator, CCTV & Video Door Phone and Spy Pen USB with Camera. These find extensive application in residential places, hospitals, corporate houses and departmental stores.

We manufacture and supply a comprehensive range of security systems and other associated electrical products. These include security system, fire alarm panel, wired sensors and siren, water level controller, digital LCD water level indicator and CCTV and video door phone. Our range of security systems encompasses following:

Category

Product

Electronic Security System

Electronic Security System

Wireless Security System

Wireless Security System

Microcontroller Security System

Microcontroller Security System

Alarm System

Alarm System

Since our inception, our quality security systems and other associated electrical products have successfully meeting to the requirements our customers. Adhered to various international standards, quality has been our key strategy while doing business. Our team of quality controllers stringently checks the raw material as well as the finished systems and other associated electrical products. Further, to ensure our clients get the best, our team of quality controllers conduct various quality test at different stages of production. Following are the test conducted by our quality controllers:

Circuit test
Accuracy
Sensor structure
